content: introducing my **garlic** knitting pattern use a combination of knit and purl stitches to make the garlic bulb to ward off any woolly vampires my knitted ** vegetable box 1 ** are super toys to encourage little ones to eat veg and greens or you can use them as decorative items in your home my veggies are worked flat but most pieces could easily be converted to knitting in the round if that is your preference pattern info - the garlic is 6 cm wide and 7 cm tall - the pattern is 2 pages and written in english - you will also need to cast on and off knit purl work increases and decreases and sew a seam materials you will need - a pair of straight 2 75 mm us 2 single-pointed knitting needles - double knitting yarns dk or light worsted weight - toy safety eyes - a few handfuls of toy filling pattern for personal use only not for resale copyright © 2020 amanda berry all rights reserved 1 https //www ravelry com/bundles/vegetable-box
